Class LezBehavior

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DriverBehavior

    public abstract class LezBehavior
extends org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.geo.agent.behavior.GeoMovingBehavior
    Abstract behavior that describes the behavior of an agent moving in an urban environment including a Low Emission Zone.

        LezBehavior constructor.

        The costs associated to arcs for this behavior are retrieved from the Neighborhood.costs(org.liris.smartgov.lez.core.agent.driver.vehicle.Vehicle) function, applied to the delivery driver's current vehicle.

        agentBody - delivery driver body
        origin - initial origin
        destination - initial destination
        context - current context
        neighborhood - current lez
